import { MorphingText } from "@/components/ui/morphing-text"

const texts = [
   "Hello",
   "Morphing",
   "Text",
   "Animation",
   "React",
   "Component",
   "Smooth",
   "Transition",
   "Engaging",
]

export default function MorphingTextDemo() {
   return <MorphingText texts={texts} />
}
